mapper.select: select i.ind_index, ind_name, ind_gender, ind_phone, ind_email, ind_resume, ind_video, ind_photo, ind_switch, ind_introduce, cat_name, car_value, p.cat_index, p.car_index from ind_profile p join individual i on p.ind_index = i.ind_index join user_main_category c on p.cat_index = c.cat_index join ind_career r on p.car_index = r. car_index

select i.ind_index, ind_name, ind_gender, ind_phone, ind_email, ind_resume, ind_video, ind_photo, ind_switch, ind_introduce from ind_profile p join individual i on p.ind_index = i.ind_index where i.ind_index = #{index}

select g.ind_index,g.ind_name,g.ind_gender,g.ind_email,g.ind_phone,e.*, u.cat_index, cat_name, r.car_index, car_value from(select c.*,d.originfile as photo_originfile, d.savefile as photo_savefile, d.savefolder as photo_savefolder from (select a.*,b.originfile as video_originfile, b.savefile as video_savefile, b.savefolder as video_savefolder from (select i.ind_index, i.ind_resume as resume_index, f.savefolder as resume_savefolder,f.originfile as resume_originfile,f.savefile as resume_savefile,i.ind_video as video_index,i.ind_photo as photo_index, i.ind_switch, i.ind_introduce from ind_profile i left outer join file_info f on i.ind_resume = f.fil_index) a left outer join file_info b on a.video_index = b.fil_index) c left outer join file_info d on c.photo_index = d.fil_index) e left outer join individual g on e.ind_index = g.ind_index join user_main_category u on cat_index = u.cat_index join ind_career r on car_index = r.car_index where e.ind_index = #{index};

select i.ind_index, ind_name, ind_gender, ind_phone, ind_email, ind_resume, ind_video, ind_photo, ind_switch, ind_introduce from ind_profile p join individual i on p.ind_index = i.ind_index where p.ind_introduce like CONCAT( '%', #{word}, '%')

select i.ind_index, ind_name, ind_gender, ind_phone, ind_email, ind_resume, ind_video, ind_photo, ind_switch, ind_introduce from ind_profile p join individual i on p.ind_index = i.ind_index where p.ind_index in (select h.tag_target from hashtag h join taglist t on h.taglist_index = t.taglist_index where h.tag_type = 0 and t.taglist_name like CONCAT( '%', #{word}, '%'))
